name: v1_qrcode
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool qr_code_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Generate custom QR codes for any data. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/qrcode.
API description: Generates a QR code image using the API Ninjas QR Code API, based on the specified input parameters.

data.description: Data to encode in the QR code.

format.description: Image format to return. Must be one of the following: png, jpg, jpeg, eps, svg.

size.description: Size of the QR code image to generate. The output will be a square image with (size x size) dimensions. Defaults to None.

fg_color.description: Foreground color of the QR code. Must be a 6-digit hex color (e.g., 00ff00 for green). Defaults to None (black).

bg_color.description: Background color of the QR code. Must be a 6-digit hex color (e.g., 00ff00 for green). Defaults to None (white).
